enhanced_by.reason: The toString method relies on the state of oldApiResponses to generate its output.
The toString method relies on the state of newApiResponses to generate its output.
The toString method relies on the context to generate its output.
Both toString and equals methods provide a comprehensive view of the object's state, making assertions on the output of toString more robust when informed by equals.
The hashCode method, like toString, provides a snapshot of the object's state, which can be useful for constructing assertions on the output of toString.
